TEXT.TITLE: CYCLOPS <CYL> NAMES DIXONS OFFICIALS TO BOARD
TEXT.BODY: Cyclops corp said it has reconstituted its board to include three <Dixons Group PLC> executives following Dixons' acquisition of 83 pct of Cyclops' 4,061,000 shares in a 95 dlr per share tender offer. Cyclops said remaining on the six-member board are chairman and chief executive W.H. Knoell, president and chief operating officer James F. Will and senior vice president William D. Dickey. Reuter
